page.title: 15Religion.
page.content: Pillowell in the Forest of Dean has been the centre of the Methodist movement for 161 yrs.The present Chapel was opened in 1885. on Sat: 18th May 1985 the centenary was celebrated.Craig Ward reports:_ The Sunday School children and villagers dressed in period costume and led by the village band,walked from the old Chapel to the "new building" Just as their fore_ fathers had done.Many of the costumes were originals.On arrival back at the Chapel,3 of the oldest members opened the doors and a service of rememberance was held.Inside the Chapel was a historical exhibition of old records and photographs,including 2 vases given to the builders 100yrs ago.
